data.title: Robert Scholes – White Rose Funeral Notices
data.text:
In loving memory of Bob Scholes who sadly passed away on 21st November 2019.

A devoted husband and father, it has been a tremendous shock to lose Bob so suddenly and unexpectedly. Details of the funeral and reception are provided below, if you could please click the button below to RSVP:

Funeral Service

The funeral service will be held at 3.20pm on Monday 16th December at Mortlake Crematorium.

Black attire is optional. In lieu of floral tributes we invite you to donate to our chosen charity ActionAid UK.

Address:

Mortlake Crematorium

Kew Meadow Path

Townmead Road

Richmond

TW9 4EN

Reception

The funeral reception will take place after the funeral service, starting at 4.30pm on Monday 16th December at The Tapestry.

Please ensure you complete the RSVP form including number of attendees and any dietary requirements.

Address:

The Tapestry

1 Lower Richmond Road

Mortlake

London

SW14 7EZ
